instance_mem.description: the instance's amount of memory in MB

instance_cores.description: define the instance's number of cores

image.description: template to use for the instance

instance_disksize.description: size of the instance's disk in GB

instance_nic.description: name of the network interface in oVirt/RHEV

zone.description: deploy the image to this oVirt cluster

instance_network.description: the logical network the machine should belong to

password.description: password of the user to authenticate with

sdomain.description: the Storage Domain where you want to create the instance's disk on.

disk_alloc.description: define if disk is thin or preallocated

url.description: the url of the oVirt instance

region.description: the oVirt/RHEV datacenter where you want to deploy to

instance_dns.description: define the instance's Primary DNS server

instance_name.description: the name of the instance to use

instance_type.description: define if the instance is a server or desktop

resource_type.description: whether you want to deploy an image or create an instance from scratch.
